verses.name: Song of Songs 4:11
verses.text: Thy lips, O my spouse, drop as the honeycomb: honey and milk are under thy tongue; and the smell of thy garments is like the smell of Lebanon.

verses.name: Song of Songs 4:12
verses.text: A garden inclosed is my sister, my spouse; a spring shut up, a fountain sealed.

verses.name: Song of Songs 4:13
verses.text: Thy plants are an orchard of pomegranates, with pleasant fruits; camphire, with spikenard,

verses.name: Song of Songs 4:14
verses.text: Spikenard and saffron; calamus and cinnamon, with all trees of frankincense; myrrh and aloes, with all the chief spices:

verses.name: Song of Songs 4:15
verses.text: A fountain of gardens, a well of living waters, and streams from Lebanon.
